Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

The start of Pride Month is just days away and right now LGBTQIA+ rights are under attack in our current political environment.

This year's Pride marks 50 years since the Stonewall Riots in New York City that started a movement. Join other ACLU-KY members, supporters, staff, and allies as we march together and make our voices heard.

March in the
Kentuckiana Pride Parade

RSVP to march with the ACLU-KY in the Kentuckiana Pride Parade.

Friday, June 14, 7 p.m.
Downtown Louisville
Staging area TBA

RSVP TODAY

RSVP to join us as we take the rally back into the streets during the Kentuckiana Pride Parade Friday, June 14 in Downtown Louisville.

We'll have t-shirts (while supplies last), flags, and stickers to celebrate visibility and show that 50 years later Pride still means protest. Please RSVP today.

We look forward to seeing you there,

ACLU of Kentucky
